short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export Property Data from Zillow to CSV/Excel with 50+ fields and proper data types

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Zillow Exporter saves time by exporting property data from Zillow.
Automatically records properties as you browse.

Features:
- Capture property data from Map, List, and Detailed views
- Convert data formats (e.g., acres to sqft)
- Support properties for sale and rent
- Export to CSV/Excel, compatible with Google Sheets and Microsoft Office
- Support 58 data points

The Free version of Zillow Exporter allows limited exports, with up to 10 full records and 100 partial records. For unlimited exports and full access to all features, please upgrade to Zillow Exporter Premium.

Zillow Exporter is not affiliated with Zillow, Inc. Zillow is a registered trademark of Zillow, Inc. All trademarks and brand names are the property of their respective owners.
